nrccMessages.message: The lifts are out of order between platform 1 and 2 (west end of station) and the subway at Cardiff Central station. Step free access to platforms 1/2 is available via the lifts east end of the station.
There are no train services at this station on Sunday 11 May because of engineering work. More details are available from the Current Engineering Work area of the National Rail Enquiries website.
